item.title: Witherwood
item.description: The Witherwood, one of the most dangerous post-Sundering zones, plays a central role in memory erosion. Not everyone has lost their memories, but many did, especially those who traveled through or awoke near Witherwood incursions. For those affected, even their names, families, and pasts might feel fragmented or lost. Your character can decide how much they remember. You might have only a name, a face in a dream, or a single relic from before. You may believe you remember everything, only to learn those memories were rewritten or distorted.
